name: cae4077a-d74c-5908-aa50-bd4934e5b09c
notes: This service provides nephelometer measurements of volume scattering coefficient in air due to dried aerosol particles observed at Puy de Dôme, France (20060101 - 20150531). The observations contain level 2 data. The time resolution is 1h. The observations are stored in the EBAS database (http://ebas.nilu.no/).
title: Measurements of volume scattering coefficient in air due to dried aerosol particles at Puy de Dôme, France (20060101 - 20150531)
